sentences.en: A sabre slammed fearsomely through the thicket in all directions.
sentences.cn: 骑兵穿过灌木丛,从四面八方发起了猛烈而可怕的攻击.

sentences.en: Foil, epee and sabre are the three weapons used in fencing competitions.
sentences.cn: 在击剑比赛中使用花剑 、 重剑和佩剑三种剑.

sentences.en: He rose to his full height, standing before her with both hands on his sabre.
sentences.cn: 他起立向他充满高度, 站在她的双手放在他的剑.

sentences.en: He stripped a tree with his sabre.
Her speech is mere sabre - rattling , ie She will not carry out her threats.
sentences.cn: 她讲的话只不过是吓唬人而已.

sentences.en: His face was seamed with sabre cuts.
sentences.cn: 他的脸上留有马刀砍下的伤痕.

sentences.en: It is too early to say whether the threats are mere sabre-rattling.
sentences.cn: 现在断言这些威胁是否只是虚张声势还为时过早。

sentences.en: The sabre is heavy and rigid.
There are three kinds of sword used in the Olympic fencing - foil, sabre, and epee.
sentences.cn: 奥运会击剑比赛使用的剑有三种:花剑 、 佩剑和重剑.

sentences.en: Until men united wield a hallowed sabre.
sentences.cn: 人们联合起来挥动那把神圣的军刀.

sentences.en: Using Swiss sabre to describe this mobile phone is apter.
sentences.cn: 用瑞士军刀来形容这款手机是比较贴切的.
